entry.title: Kitchen Gift Basket - 10% off!
entry.summary:
Vendor: EcoFair
Type:
Price: 80.50 - 112.00 (2 variants)

Kitchen Gift Basket $80.50 (was $89.45)

  • Bolga Mini ($40) - Ghana
  • Kantha Dish Cloth & Towel * - India
  • Salad Servers - Kenya
  • Peace Soap Dish Bar, 100% Olive Oil - Palestine & Israel
  • FairMail Greeting Card (free!)

Add a large Bolga for $35 more!

* Dish cloths & towels are double-layer, reversible, made from upcycled cotton saris and are all random colours and patterns. Specify preferred colours and we will do our best to accommodate.

Note: All Bolga baskets are natural style but we are happy to make any other substitution! Choose any other basket available and specify selection in notes of the shopping cart.
